This Borland JBuilder project includes all packages of the "Remote Tea" ONC/RPC Java Library, so you can easily build the whole shebang with one click. Just select the root node called "remotetea.jpr". Then, from the menu select "Project" and "Create project remotetea.jpr".

Useful links:

  • The README document which explains the directory structure and what you maybe can find in all these places.
  • The Change Log summarizes the current as well as the previous episodes.
  • Remote Tea ONC/RPC online documentation (local)
  • Remote Tea Home Page (web). Always contains the most current information about the Remote Tea ONC/RPC Java Library.
